Replace.Text: Farms give standard adjacency bonuses to Commercial Centers, small adjacency bonuses to Theater Squares, culture bombs on unclaimed territories, and +1 [ICON_Production] Production after researching Humanism, +1 [ICON_Production] Production after researching Computers After +2 [ICON_Production] Production. Cities gain borders -50% faster.

Gary features improved. Unlocked by the civic "Humanism". +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +1 Charisma. +1 [ICON_Culture] culture if adjacent to the entertainment area; +1 [ICON_Culture] culture if adjacent to the theater square; +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins when adjacent to a community; after unlocking the "flying" technology Finally, tourism performance can be provided based on cultural output. Only one can be built per city. Cannot be built on Flood Plains, Desert or Desert Hills terrain.
Gary Medieval unique ranged unit that replaces the crossbowman. +1 [ICON_Movement] to movement, [ICON_Strength] to higher attack. No movement penalty for moving in hills, forests and rainforests.

When the farm is adjacent to the commercial center, it provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins +2; when it is adjacent to the theater square, it provides [ICON_Culture] culture +1, and provides tourism achievements after possessing the "flying" technology. -30% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building buildings.

All land ranged units +1 vision and range, all ranged units combat experience +30%. All land ranged units gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Attack when fighting major civilizations. Every time you train a ranged unit, you get another ranged unit.

Trust your whimsy, Feng Shan. under your leadership. Tens of thousands of acres of fertile land will become an amazing picture scroll. Your outstanding personality will help you make allies as you explore the world. With the power of unity, you will lead the people to glory, and history will remember your name and great achievements.

General Feng Shan, lead the soldiers to expand the territory! All the enemy's resistance is futile in the face of your strong bow. The point of your sword is the heart of the soldiers! Fight for a more glorious country!
